home.chip: Privacy-first AI detection â€” processed 100% locally
home.headline: Detect
home.subtitle: Upload an image or video and let our multi-signal engine analyze it for signs of AI generation â€” all within your browser.
home.pasteHint: Images & videos Â· up to 100MB Â· or
home.disclaimer: Results are heuristic-based indicators, not definitive proof.
home.errorUnsupported: Unsupported format. Use JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, MP4, or WebM.
home.errorFailed: Analysis failed. Try a different file.
home.summaryAi: This content is likely AI-generated. Multiple anomalies detected in image structure.
home.summaryReal: This content appears authentic. Analysis indicators are consistent with natural photography.
home.summaryUncertain: Unable to determine clearly. Content requires further examination with additional tools.
home.explainHigh: High score indicates many AI-typical features â€” unusually smooth edges, repeating patterns, lack of natural noise.
home.explainMid: Medium score â€” the image has some AI-like features but not enough for a clear conclusion. Further verification recommended.
home.explainLow: Low score indicates natural characteristics â€” sensor noise, edge variation, and metadata consistent with real photography.
home.singleMethodHint: Guest mode â€” select one method to analyze
home.signInForFull: Sign in to unlock all 40+ methods combined analysis â†’
notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
methods.headline: Analysis
methods.subtitle1: SourceVerify uses 13 forensic signals to detect AI-generated content.
methods.subtitle2: Learn about each method and how they contribute to the analysis.
product.headline: Verify media
product.subtitle: An open-source detection engine that analyzes images and videos for signs of AI generation â€” entirely in your browser.
product.card1.title: Multi-signal engine
product.card1.desc: 13 detection algorithms running in parallel â€” frequency analysis, noise patterns, edge detection, metadata inspection and more.
product.card2.title: Privacy by design
product.card2.desc: Every computation happens on your device. No uploads, no servers, no tracking â€” your files never leave your browser.
product.card3.title: Real-time results
product.card3.desc: Analysis completes in milliseconds. No queues, no waiting, no accounts required.
features.headline: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for verifying media authenticity â€” built for transparency and trust.
features.item1.title: Multi-signal Analysis
features.item1.desc: 13 detection algorithms analyze frequency, noise, edge patterns, DCT artifacts, color correlation, and PRNU sensor noise simultaneously for comprehensive coverage.
features.item2.title: 100% Private
features.item2.desc: All processing runs locally in your browser. Zero data is ever uploaded to any server.
features.item3.title: Instant Results
features.item3.desc: Get detailed analysis results in milliseconds â€” no waiting for server-side processing.
features.item4.title: High Accuracy
features.item4.desc: Advanced heuristic-based detection with confidence scoring across multiple dimensions.
features.item5.title: Images & Video
features.item5.desc: Full support for JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, AVIF, MP4, WebM â€” all popular image and video formats.
features.item6.title: Detailed Reports
features.item6.desc: Visual breakdown of every detection signal with score analysis and file info extraction.
howItWorks.headline: Three simple
howItWorks.subtitle: From upload to verdict in seconds â€” no setup, no account, no data collection.
howItWorks.step1.title: Upload your file
howItWorks.step1.desc: Drag and drop or click to upload any image or video. We support JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, MP4, WebM and more â€” up to 100MB.
howItWorks.step2.title: Multi-signal analysis
howItWorks.step2.desc: Our engine runs 13 detection algorithms in parallel â€” analyzing frequency patterns, noise signatures, edge artifacts, DCT compression fingerprints, and PRNU sensor noise â€” all locally in your browser.
howItWorks.step3.title: Get your results
howItWorks.step3.desc: View a detailed breakdown with an overall confidence score, individual signal analysis, and clear verdict on whether the content appears AI-generated.
about.headline: Building
about.p1: As AI-generated content becomes increasingly indistinguishable from real media, the need for reliable detection tools has never been greater.
about.p2prefix: SourceVerify is our answer â€” an
about.p2suffix: detection engine that empowers anyone to verify content authenticity.
about.p3: Every analysis runs entirely in your browser â€” no uploads, no tracking, no compromise.
about.stat1.label: Open source
about.stat2.label: Data collected
about.stat3.label: Detection signals
signal.metadata.aiDetected: AI generation software detected in file metadata
signal.metadata.cameraDetected: Real camera signature detected in metadata
signal.metadata.namingPattern: File naming pattern suggests AI generation
signal.metadata.aiResolution: Resolution matches common AI output dimensions
signal.noise.ai: Noise pattern is unusually uniform â€” common in AI-generated images
signal.noise.real: Noise varies naturally across the image â€” consistent with real photography
signal.edge.ai: Edge patterns are unusually smooth â€” may indicate AI generation
signal.edge.real: Edge patterns show natural variation â€” consistent with real content
signal.color.ai: Color channel correlations are abnormal â€” AI generates color channels differently than natural light
signal.color.real: Color channels correlate naturally â€” consistent with camera sensor and optics
signal.frequency.ai: Low high-frequency content detected â€” characteristic of AI generation
signal.frequency.real: Frequency spectrum consistent with real camera capture
signal.texture.ai: Texture detail is unusually consistent across regions â€” may indicate AI
signal.texture.real: Texture detail varies naturally across the image
signal.compression.largePng: Large PNG file â€” common in AI tool output
signal.compression.heavyJpeg: Heavily compressed JPEG â€” may be re-saved AI content
signal.compression.webp: WebP format â€” common in both AI and web content
signal.symmetry.ai: Unusually high symmetry detected â€” potentially AI-generated
signal.symmetry.real: Natural asymmetry â€” consistent with real content
signal.video.short: Very short video â€” common in AI video generation
signal.video.long: Long video â€” less likely to be fully AI-generated
signal.dct.ai: No or uniform JPEG block artifacts â€” AI images lack natural compression fingerprints
signal.dct.real: Natural JPEG block artifacts present â€” consistent with real camera compression
signal.dct.error: Image too small for DCT analysis
signal.color.error: Insufficient data for color channel analysis
signal.prnu.ai: No consistent sensor pattern noise detected â€” AI images lack camera PRNU fingerprint
signal.prnu.real: Sensor pattern noise detected â€” consistent with real camera PRNU fingerprint
signal.spectral.ai: Spectral peaks at Nyquist frequencies detected â€” characteristic of AI upsampling artifacts
signal.spectral.real: Spectral distribution is smooth â€” consistent with natural photography
signal.benford.ai: Pixel gradients deviate from Benford's Law â€” characteristic of AI generation
signal.benford.real: Pixel gradients follow natural statistical distribution
signal.chromatic.ai: No chromatic aberration â€” real camera lenses produce color fringing
signal.chromatic.real: Chromatic aberration present â€” consistent with real camera optics
signal.cfa.ai: No Bayer CFA demosaicing pattern found â€” real cameras leave this fingerprint
signal.cfa.real: CFA demosaicing artifacts present â€” characteristic of real camera sensors
signal.reconstruction.ai: Reconstruction errors are unnaturally uniform â€” typical of AI-generated content
signal.reconstruction.real: Reconstruction shows natural variation â€” consistent with real photography
signal.gradient.ai: Smooth regions lack natural micro-texture â€” AI images miss sensor-level noise
signal.gradient.real: Smooth regions contain natural micro-texture from camera sensor
api.overview.desc: Integrate AI-generated content detection into your applications with a simple REST API. Analyze images in milliseconds with industry-leading accuracy.
api.overview.feature1.title: Image Analysis
api.overview.feature1.desc: Detect AI-generated images with advanced multi-signal analysis and deep learning models.
api.overview.feature2.title: Fast & Reliable
api.overview.feature2.desc: Average response time under 500ms with 99.9% uptime guarantee and global CDN.
api.overview.feature3.title: REST API
api.overview.feature3.desc: Simple HTTP endpoints with JSON responses. Easy to integrate with any language.
api.auth.title: Authentication
api.auth.desc: All API requests require an API key sent via the {code} header.
api.auth.signInPrompt: Sign in with Google to get your API key.
api.auth.noClientId: Google Client ID not configured. Set {code} in your environment.
api.rateLimits.title: Rate Limits
api.rateLimits.desc: API rate limits vary by plan. Exceeding them returns {code}.
api.rateLimits.headersDesc: Each response includes headers to track your usage:
api.rateLimits.resetDesc: Unix timestamp when the window resets
api.endpoint.title: Analyze Image
api.endpoint.desc: Upload an image file to analyze whether it was AI-generated or authentic.
api.urlAnalysis.title: Analyze by URL
api.urlAnalysis.desc: Analyze an image by providing its public URL instead of uploading a file.
api.urlAnalysis.urlDesc: Public URL of the image to analyze
api.batch.title: Batch Analysis
api.batch.desc: Analyze up to 10 images in a single request. Results are returned in the same order as the input.
api.history.title: Analysis History
api.history.desc: Retrieve your past analysis results with pagination and filtering support.
api.history.verdictDesc: Filter by verdict: ai, real, uncertain
api.response.title: Response Format
api.response.desc: All endpoints return JSON with a consistent structure.
api.response.verdictDesc: Detection result: ai, real, or uncertain
api.verdict.title: Verdict Values
api.verdict.desc: The {code} field indicates the classification result.
api.verdict.bestPracticeDesc: For production use, treat "uncertain" results as requiring human review. Consider using the confidence score alongside the verdict for nuanced decision-making.
api.errors.title: Error Codes
api.errors.desc: When an error occurs, the API returns an appropriate HTTP status code with details.
api.errors.invalidUrl: URL is not a valid image URL
api.errors.forbidden: API key does not have required permissions
api.webhooks.title: Webhooks
api.webhooks.desc: Receive real-time notifications when an analysis completes. Register a webhook URL to get POST requests with results.
api.webhooks.secretDesc: Signing secret for verifying webhook payloads
api.examples.title: Code Examples
api.examples.desc: Quick start examples in 12 programming languages.
api.methods.title: Analysis Methods
api.methods.desc: SourceVerify uses 13 forensic signals to detect AI-generated content. You can enable or disable each method via the API to customize your analysis pipeline.
api.methods.usageDesc: Pass the signals parameter in your API request to select specific methods:
signal.lbp.ai: LBP texture patterns lack diversity â€” characteristic of AI-generated surfaces
signal.lbp.real: LBP texture shows natural diversity â€” consistent with real photography
signal.hog.ai: Gradient orientations are unusually uniform â€” typical of AI generation
signal.hog.real: Gradient orientations show natural variation â€” consistent with real scenes
signal.glcm.ai: GLCM features indicate overly smooth texture â€” typical of AI generation
signal.glcm.real: GLCM texture features are consistent with natural image characteristics
signal.localVariance.ai: Local variance is unusually uniform â€” AI images lack natural variance variation
signal.localVariance.real: Local variance varies naturally across the image â€” consistent with real capture
signal.localVariance.error: Insufficient data for local variance analysis
signal.morph.ai: Morphological gradients are too narrow â€” AI images lack micro-detail transitions
signal.morph.real: Morphological gradients show natural range â€” consistent with real camera capture
signal.weber.ai: Weber excitation is unusually low â€” AI images lack natural intensity transitions
signal.weber.real: Weber excitation shows natural variation â€” consistent with real image detail
signal.wavelet.ai: Wavelet coefficients show Gaussian distribution â€” AI images lack natural heavy-tailed statistics
signal.wavelet.real: Wavelet coefficients show natural heavy-tailed distribution â€” consistent with real images
signal.gabor.ai: Gabor filter shows isotropic response â€” AI images lack directional texture variation
signal.gabor.real: Gabor filter response shows natural directional variation in texture
signal.psd.ai: Power spectral density deviates from natural 1/fÂ² law â€” potential AI generation
signal.psd.real: Power spectral density follows natural 1/fÂ² power law â€” consistent with real images
signal.phase.ai: Phase congruency is overly uniform â€” AI images have artificial edge structure
signal.phase.real: Phase congruency varies naturally â€” consistent with real scene geometry
signal.phase.error: Insufficient data for phase congruency analysis
signal.radial.ai: Radial power spectrum shows atypical frequency distribution â€” potential AI signature
signal.radial.real: Radial power spectrum shows natural frequency falloff â€” consistent with camera optics
signal.radial.error: Insufficient data for radial spectrum analysis
signal.freqBand.ai: High-frequency energy is unusually low â€” AI images lack fine detail
signal.freqBand.real: Frequency band distribution is natural â€” consistent with real camera capture
signal.entropy.ai: Entropy distribution is too uniform â€” AI images lack natural information variation
signal.entropy.real: Entropy distribution varies naturally â€” consistent with real scene content
signal.hos.ai: Gradient statistics are too Gaussian â€” natural images have heavier-tailed distributions
signal.hos.real: Gradient statistics show natural heavy-tailed distribution
signal.zipf.ai: Intensity distribution deviates from Zipf's law â€” potential AI generation artifact
signal.zipf.real: Intensity distribution follows natural Zipf-like pattern
signal.chiSquare.ai: LSB distribution shows statistical anomaly â€” potential AI generation artifact
signal.markov.ai: Pixel transitions show abnormal smoothness â€” AI images have over-correlated pixels
signal.markov.real: Pixel transition patterns appear natural â€” consistent with real image content
signal.saturation.ai: Saturation profile is abnormal â€” AI images exhibit biased color saturation
signal.saturation.real: Saturation distribution is natural â€” consistent with real photography
signal.jpegGhost.ai: No JPEG block boundaries detected â€” image may not originate from camera compression
signal.jpegGhost.real: JPEG block boundary artifacts present â€” consistent with camera compression pipeline
signal.jpegGhost.error: Image too small for JPEG ghost analysis
signal.quant.ai: No JPEG quantization patterns â€” image appears to bypass standard compression
signal.quant.real: JPEG quantization patterns present â€” consistent with standard camera pipeline
signal.quant.error: Image too small for quantization analysis
signal.ela.ai: Error levels are unusually uniform â€” AI images lack compression-induced variation
signal.ela.real: Error levels vary naturally â€” consistent with real camera compression
signal.banding.ai: Significant color banding detected â€” AI generation or heavy post-processing artifact
signal.banding.real: Smooth gradients without banding â€” consistent with high-quality capture
signal.gan.ai: Spectral peaks detected â€” characteristic fingerprint of GAN-based generation
signal.gan.real: No GAN spectral fingerprint detected â€” frequency spectrum appears natural
signal.upsampling.ai: Checkerboard upsampling artifacts detected â€” common in neural network generation
signal.upsampling.real: No upsampling artifacts found â€” image pixel structure appears natural
signal.diffusion.ai: Mid-frequency smoothing with sharp edges detected â€” pattern consistent with diffusion models
signal.diffusion.real: No diffusion model artifacts detected â€” frequency structure appears natural
signal.perspective.ai: Edge direction distribution suggests inconsistent perspective geometry
signal.perspective.real: Edge directions show consistent perspective structure â€” natural scene geometry
signal.perspective.error: Not enough strong edges for perspective analysis
signal.lighting.ai: Lighting direction varies significantly across regions â€” physically inconsistent
signal.lighting.real: Lighting direction is consistent across regions â€” natural illumination pattern
signal.lighting.error: Not enough regions for lighting analysis
signal.shadow.ai: Shadow distribution appears physically inconsistent â€” potential AI generation
signal.shadow.real: Shadow distribution is physically plausible â€” natural lighting and shadow patterns
signal.shadow.error: Not enough data for shadow analysis
signal.gamut.ai: Color gamut shows unnatural vibrancy â€” AI images often exceed natural camera gamut
signal.gamut.real: Color gamut falls within natural range â€” consistent with camera sensor response
signal.wb.ai: White balance is suspiciously uniform â€” real scenes have subtle WB variation from mixed lighting
signal.wb.real: White balance varies naturally across regions â€” consistent with real-world illumination
signal.wb.error: Not enough regions for white balance analysis
